moduleMetadataJson.name: TFTP File Server
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module provides a TFTP service
author: jduck <jduck@metasploit.com>
todb <todb@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SRVHOST
options.description: The local host to listen on.

options.name: SRVPORT
options.description: The local port to listen on.

options.name: TFTPROOT
options.description: The TFTP root directory to serve files from

options.name: OUTPUTPATH
options.description: The directory in which uploaded files will be written.
